column4: hello! Is anybody using avant-window-navigator dock on KDE/Kubuntu?
I have a problem with kde + avant-window-navigator...i have no icons! Must I install gnome-icon? What are the dependencies?
the more I use linux, the more I try to turn of extra graphical features... have you tried using Alt - Shift instead of this dock?
I use a lot of utils so a dock is convenient
